content.raw: It looks like some models support the “ASCII protocol” and others support the “binary protocol”,  and that some support both. So I think I need to add a kwarg to choose which protocol to use, and implement use of the ascii protocol as well. The necessary code is a trivial couple of lines, but I won’t be able to test it unless I actually come across a device that supports it. We may have one already, I’ll have a poke around.
content.html: It looks like some models support the “ASCII protocol” and others support the “binary protocol”, and that some support both. So I think I need to add a kwarg to choose which protocol to use, and implement use of the ascii protocol as well. The necessary code is a trivial couple of lines, but I won’t be able to test it unless I actually come across a device that supports it. We may have one already, I’ll have a poke around.
